42 QuadcopterGui::QuadcopterGui() : rqt_gui_cpp::Plugin()
43  , context_(0)
44  , widget_(0)
45  , update_component_id()
46 {
47  setObjectName("QuadcopterGui");
48 }
49 
50 QuadcopterGui::~QuadcopterGui()
51 {
52 }
53 
54 void QuadcopterGui::initPlugin(qt_gui_cpp::PluginContext& context)
55 {
56  widget_ = new QWidget();
57  ui_.setupUi(widget_);
58 
59 
60  context_ = &context;
61 
62  widget_->setWindowTitle("Quadcoptergui[*]");
63 
64  if (context.serialNumber() != 1)
65  {
66  widget_->setWindowTitle(widget_->windowTitle() + " (" + QString::number(context.serialNumber()) + ")");
67  }
68 
69  context.addWidget(widget_);
70 
71  // trigger deleteLater for plugin when widget or frame is closed
72  widget_->installEventFilter(this);
73 
74  //set ui textbrowser to be read only:
75  ui_.textBrowser->setReadOnly(true);
76 
77  //Get ros NodeHandle from parent nodelet manager:
78  ros::NodeHandle nh = getNodeHandle();
79  //Subscribers:
80  gui_state_subscriber_ = nh.subscribe("/gui_state",10,&QuadcopterGui::guistateCallback, this);
81 
82  quad_state_subscriber_ = nh.subscribe("/quad_status",10,&QuadcopterGui::quadstateCallback,this);
83 
84  //Publishers:
85  gui_command_publisher_ = nh.advertise<rqt_quadcoptergui::GuiCommandMessage>("/gui_commands",10);
86 
87  //Setup the timer to refresh Gui
88  timer = new QTimer(widget_);
89  connect(timer, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(RefreshGui()));
90  timer->start(50);//20Hz
91 
92  //Connect all the slots as needed
93  connect(ui_.Takeoffbutton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(wrappertakeoff()));
94  connect(ui_.Landbutton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(wrapperLand()));
95  connect(ui_.Disarmbutton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(wrapperDisarm()));
96  connect(ui_.InitiializeMPCButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(wrapperInitializeMPC()));
97  connect(ui_.tracking_checkbox, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),SLOT(stateChangeTracking(int)));
98  connect(ui_.log_checkbox, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),SLOT(stateChangeLogging(int)));
99  connect(ui_.velcontrol_checkbox, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),SLOT(stateChangeVelControl(int)));
100  connect(ui_.rpycontrol_checkbox, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),SLOT(stateChangeRpyControl(int)));
101  connect(ui_.poscontrol_checkbox, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),SLOT(stateChangePosControl(int)));
102  connect(ui_.mpc_state_checkbox, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),SLOT(stateChangeMPCControl(int)));
103  connect(ui_.trajectory_tracking_checkbox, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),SLOT(stateChangeTrajectoryTracking(int)));
104  connect(ui_.enable_arm_checkbox, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),SLOT(stateChangeEnableArm(int)));
105 }
106 
107 bool QuadcopterGui::eventFilter(QObject* watched, QEvent* event)
108 {
109  if (watched == widget_ && event->type() == QEvent::Close)
110  {
111  ROS_INFO("Closing...");
112  event->ignore();
113  context_->closePlugin();
114  return true;
115  }
116  return QObject::eventFilter(watched, event);
117 }
118 
120 void QuadcopterGui::wrappertakeoff()
121 {
122  GuiCommandMessage msg;
123  msg.commponent_name = msg.arm_quad;
124  gui_command_publisher_.publish(msg);
125 }
126 
127 void QuadcopterGui::wrapperLand()
128 {
129  GuiCommandMessage msg;
130  msg.commponent_name = msg.land_quad;
131  gui_command_publisher_.publish(msg);
132 }

141 void QuadcopterGui::wrapperInitializeMPC()

147 
148 void QuadcopterGui::RefreshGui()
149 {
150  qgui_mutex_.lock();
151  QString msg = QString::fromStdString(quad_status);
152  qgui_mutex_.unlock();
153  ui_.textBrowser->setPlainText(msg);
154 }
155 
156 void QuadcopterGui::stateChangeLogging(int state)
157 {
158  if(checkUpdateState(state_msg.log_status))//Check if input is from onboard Node
159  return;
160  GuiCommandMessage msg;
161  if(state == Qt::Checked)
162  msg.command = true;
163  else
164  msg.command = false;
165  msg.commponent_name = msg.enable_log;
166  gui_command_publisher_.publish(msg);
167 }
168

175  msg.command = true;

179  gui_command_publisher_.publish(msg);
180 }

261 void QuadcopterGui::shutdownPlugin()
262 {
263  gui_state_subscriber_.shutdown();
264  quad_state_subscriber_.shutdown();
265 
266  gui_command_publisher_.shutdown();
267 }

270 
271 void QuadcopterGui::guistateCallback(const GuiStateMessage & statemsg)
272 {
273  //Change UI states:
274  switch(statemsg.commponent_id)
275  {
276  case statemsg.log_status:
277  if(statemsg.status != ui_.log_checkbox->isChecked())
278  {
279  qgui_mutex_.lock();
280  update_component_id[statemsg.commponent_id] = true;
281  qgui_mutex_.unlock();
282  ui_.log_checkbox->setCheckState(CHECKSTATE(statemsg.status));
283  }
284  break;
285  case statemsg.tracking_status:
286  if(statemsg.status != ui_.tracking_checkbox->isChecked())
287  {
288  qgui_mutex_.lock();
289  update_component_id[statemsg.commponent_id] = true;
290  qgui_mutex_.unlock();
291  ui_.tracking_checkbox->setCheckState(CHECKSTATE(statemsg.status));
292  }
293  break;
294  case statemsg.vel_control_status:
295  if(statemsg.status != ui_.velcontrol_checkbox->isChecked())
296  {
297  qgui_mutex_.lock();
298  update_component_id[statemsg.commponent_id] = true;
299  qgui_mutex_.unlock();
300  ui_.velcontrol_checkbox->setCheckState(CHECKSTATE(statemsg.status));
301  }
302  break;
303  case statemsg.rpyt_control_status:
304  if(statemsg.status != ui_.rpycontrol_checkbox->isChecked())
305  {
306  qgui_mutex_.lock();
307  update_component_id[statemsg.commponent_id] = true;
308  qgui_mutex_.unlock();
309  ui_.rpycontrol_checkbox->setCheckState(CHECKSTATE(statemsg.status));
310  }
311  break;
312  case statemsg.pos_control_status:
313  if(statemsg.status != ui_.poscontrol_checkbox->isChecked())
314  {
315  qgui_mutex_.lock();
316  update_component_id[statemsg.commponent_id] = true;
317  qgui_mutex_.unlock();
318  ui_.poscontrol_checkbox->setCheckState(CHECKSTATE(statemsg.status));
319  }
320  break;
321  case statemsg.mpc_control_status:
322  if(statemsg.status != ui_.mpc_state_checkbox->isChecked())
323  {
324  qgui_mutex_.lock();
325  update_component_id[statemsg.commponent_id] = true;
326  qgui_mutex_.unlock();
327  ui_.mpc_state_checkbox->setCheckState(CHECKSTATE(statemsg.status));
328  }
329  break;
330  case statemsg.trajectory_tracking_status:
331  if(statemsg.status != ui_.trajectory_tracking_checkbox->isChecked())
332  {
333  qgui_mutex_.lock();
334  update_component_id[statemsg.commponent_id] = true;
335  qgui_mutex_.unlock();
336  ui_.trajectory_tracking_checkbox->setCheckState(CHECKSTATE(statemsg.status));
337  }
338  break;
339  case statemsg.enable_arm_status:
340  if(statemsg.status != ui_.enable_arm_checkbox->isChecked())
341  {
342  qgui_mutex_.lock();
343  update_component_id[statemsg.commponent_id] = true;
344  qgui_mutex_.unlock();
345  ui_.enable_arm_checkbox->setCheckState(CHECKSTATE(statemsg.status));
346  }
347  break;
348  }
349 }
350 
351 void QuadcopterGui::quadstateCallback(const std_msgs::String & statemsg)
352 {
353  qgui_mutex_.lock();
354  quad_status = statemsg.data;
355  qgui_mutex_.unlock();
356 }
357

bool checkUpdateState(int index)
check if update is from OnboardNodeHandler
Definition: quadcoptergui.h:143
rqt_quadcoptergui::QuadcopterGui
The Gui Class which sends commands to OnboardNodeHandler through GuiCommandMessages. It shows the states of various modes using check boxes and has buttons for commands without states. The Gui Class updates the checkboxes based on user inputs and also based on inputs from OnboardNodeHandler.
Definition: quadcoptergui.h:86

ros::Publisher gui_command_publisher_
Publish gui commands due to checkboxes and buttons.
